PropertyValue.Value: SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.device_id, t.file_type, t.file_name, bt.file_type_name, t.deal_date, t.deal_time, case t.deal_result when 0 then '成功' when 1 then '失败' when 2 then '检查失败' when 3 then '未处理' else '其他' end AS status_name, t.deal_result, case t.is_pack when '00' then '未打包' when '01' then '已打包' else '其它' end AS is_pack FROM data_file_deal_info t LEFT JOIN basi_file_type_info bt ON t.file_type = bt.file_type AND t.file_sub_type = bt.file_sub_type) as ttt
